subject: Shipping question
description_text:
Do you ship to Poland, cause I don't see an option while putting in my home
address. I'd love to purchase pedal set if you actually do.

conversations.body_text: Hi Miłosz Wojciechowski,  ​We are sorry to inform you that our products cannot be shipped to Poland.  Thank you for your inquiry. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us anytime. We will respond as soon as possible.
